_header: Climb not too high / Lest chips fall in thine eye
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 316; variant of 1863.
_description: Proverbial saying on the theme of overreaching — one couplet

OxfBal354.Transcription: Clime not to hie lest chipis fall in thin eye
